name: Drunk Vs. Vampire
description:
Drunk Vs Vampire is a mobile game that works on Android platform. I've developed this game since 2017.

Fight for the love of your life! the main character is a Drunk that has been in love for a long time, but he needs to fight Draculo to save the girl's cat so maybe he can get a chance to keep the girl.

· Unlimited fight!

· Collect Bones

Unfortunately this game is in Spanish.
